```

Call:
lm(formula = y ~ x, data = rxy(1e+06))

Residuals:
    Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
-2.3144 -0.8751 -0.4686  0.3644 26.8234 

Coefficients:
            Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept) 2.000329   0.001447    1382   <2e-16 ***
x           1.001417   0.001447     692   <2e-16 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 1.447 on 999998 degrees of freedom
Multiple R-squared:  0.3238,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.3238 
F-statistic: 4.789e+05 on 1 and 999998 DF,  p-value: < 2.2e-16
```
